description: Develops expertise in server side engineering

signals: Aligns with other teams on project scope, domain and boundaries
Analyzes and identifies possible project delays and reports to stakeholders
Takes ownership and responsibility for organizational practices and processes and their continuous improvement
Able to decrypt unclear stakeholder requirements and drives for clarity to ensure right problem is addressed
examples: Tasks prioritization together with product and business, focusing on creating value
Reviews epics and projects critically and ensures they are appropriately broken down, prioritised and well understood by the team

signals: Often helps refine roadmaps across teams based on technical strategy & constraints
Focuses on simplification of systems and processes to ensure fast and reliable delivery of our products
Takes ownership and responsibility for organizational practices and processes and their continuous improvement
examples: Works across teams to recommend solutions to identified gaps  --> Leading execution of cross-teams initiatives
Translates strategy set by M3/M4 into team OKRs
Helps to define & create new product abilities by changing technical strategy or constraints

signals: Ensures the team follows best practices and procedures to deliver global solutions
Ability to focus on the core, separating the noise from the essentials to deliver simple, pragmatic solutions
examples: Maintains close connections with technology stakeholders from different entities across regions where applicable
Maintains close connections with technology peers from different departments

signals: Ability to anticipate and mitigate risks (especially around security)
Maximises impact for customers in everything they do
Strongly oriented towards goals and ensures several teams are continuously working towards their goals
examples: Ensures goals are understood and continuously worked towards across the organization
Often helps refine roadmaps across teams based on technical strategy & constraints
Collaborates with entity teams to solve problems at a global scale
Improves operational excellence accross the organziation
